Export.Routine: PRTDR0ESP02 ; Doctor's Report HEADER - Badalona q ; IG 23/03/99 ; supported calls ; ; INIT^PRTDR004 ; QDR^PRTDR004 ; Header^PRTDR004(page,par1,par2) ; Footer^PRTDR004(page,par1,par2) ; $$name^PRTDR004(Title,Name,Surname) ; ; ; client specific parameters ABScreen() q "X0015" INIT s MaxLine=44 q ; create normal layouts Create1(vtsRID,cum,group,cOrder) s DH=dh1,PrintTestHeader=1 i '$$SINGLE^PRTDR00(vtsRID,"P",cum,,DH),PLIST d . ; check Breaks .s (x1,x2)="" f s x1=$o(Breaks(x1)) q:x1="" d:$l(x2) s x2=x1 ..s x3=0 f j=x2:1:x1 i $e($g(PLIST(j)))="!" s x3=x3+1 ..s Breaks(x2)=x3 .i $l(x2) d ..s x3=0 f j=x2:1:PLIST i $e($g(PLIST(j)))="!" s x3=x3+1 ..s Breaks(x2)=x3 .s TestHeader=0 f j=1:1:HEADER i HEADER(j)="!" s TestHeader=TestHeader+1 .s TestBody=0 f j=1:1:PLIST i PLIST(j)="!",j<PLIST s TestBody=TestBody+1 .s test=$p(vtsRID,"||",2) s StopSplit=$$seldata^LVBCTTS(test,25) .s StopSplit=$p(StopSplit,$c(1)) .s Start="Y",NewPage=ForceNewPage f jLine=1:1:PLIST d ..i $o(^TMP("REPORT",$j,""))="" s NewPage=1 ..i 'NewPage,jLine=1,StopSplit="Y",PageLine+TestHeader+TestBody+5>MaxLine s NewPage=1 ..i 'NewPage,$d(Breaks(jLine)),PageLine+TestHeader+Breaks(jLine)>MaxLine s NewPage=1 ..i (jLine=1)!NewPage d ...i 'NewPage d OldPage^PRTDR00(vtsRID) ...i NewPage d NewPage^PRTDR00(vtsRID) ..i Start="Y" d s Start="N" ...i REPORT(5)="Y" d PrintDepHeader^PRTDR00 ...d PrintTestHeader^PRTDR00(1) ..i PLIST(jLine)="!" s PageLine=PageLine+1 i PageLine>MaxLine s NewPage=1 i jLine=PLIST q ..s x=$o(^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",""),-1)+1 .. ; i " ! # ~ "[(" "_$e(PLIST(jLine))_" ") s ^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",x)=PLIST(jLine) .. ; e s ^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",x)=$j(PageLine,2)_" "_PLIST(jLine) ..s ^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",x)=PLIST(jLine) .d CheckLastPage^PRTDR00 .s (Word1,Word2,AuthUser,PathUser)="" .s Word1=$$seldata^LVBCTTS($$seldata^LVBVISTS(vtsRID,3),31) .s Word2=$$seldata^LVBCTTS($$seldata^LVBVISTS(vtsRID,3),54) .s AuthUser=$$seldata^LVBVISTS(vtsRID,9) .s PathUser=$$seldata^MVBSSUSR($$seldata^LVBVISTS(vtsRID,10),3) .s PathQual=$$seldata^MVBSSUSR($$seldata^LVBVISTS(vtsRID,10),14) .i cum="",(Word1="Y")!(Word2="Y") d ..s x=$o(^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",""),-1)+1 ..s ^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",x)="!" ..s ^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",x+1)="!" ..s ^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",x+2)=" Autoritzat per "_PathUser ..s ^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEXT",x+3)="!" ..s PageLine=PageLine+3 q ; print header Header(page,par1,par2) n (page,par1,par2,VISIT,DOC,REPID) i '$d(^PR(REPID,"HDR")) d QDR d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT","#") ; find location i VISIT(22)'="" s location=$p(VISIT(22),$c(1),2) e s location=$p(DOC(9),$c(1)) s (copyto,copyfrom,specimen)="",epis=$p(VISIT(2),$c(1)) n DOC I '$$select^LVBCTDR($p(VISIT(15),$c(1)),"Y") m DOC=PLIST I $P(VISIT(27),$C(1))'="" s specimen=$P($G(^TTAB("CC",$P(VISIT(27),$C(1)))),"\") ; GET FIRST AUTH TEST SET DATE/TIME S EPI=$P(VISIT(2),$C(1)),XXTS="",DTA="" F S XXTS=$O(^TEPI(EPI,1,XXTS)) Q:XXTS="" S Z=$G(^(XXTS,1)) I $P(Z,"\",4)>$P(DTA,"\",4) S DTA=Z I DTA'="" s Z=DTA,DTA=$$extdate2^SSUTIL4($P(Z,"\",4))_" "_$e($P(Z,"\",5)\60+100,2,3)_":"_$e($P(Z,"\",5)#60+100,2,3) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s0b4101T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a180h740V"_$P($p(VISIT(65),$c(1)),",",2,99)) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s3b4101T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a1070h740V"_$p(VISIT(3),$c(1))) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s3b4101T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a2800h740V"_$p(VISIT(4),$c(1))) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s0b4101T") i '$l($p(VISIT(6),$c(1))) s VISIT(6)="Desconegut" d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a4500h740V"_$s(VISIT(6)="Desconegut":"Desconegut",1:$$extdate2^SSUTIL4(VISIT(6)))) i '$l($p(VISIT(5),$c(1),2)) s $p(VISIT(5),$c(1),2)="Desconegut" d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a5190h740V"_$p(VISIT(5),$c(1),2)) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s1b4101T") i $d(DOC) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a180h1070V"_$$name(DOC(26),DOC(4),DOC(3))) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s0b4101T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a4100h1070V"_location) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a2050h1070V"_VISIT(112)) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a180h1480V"_$p(VISIT(2),$c(1))) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a720h1480V"_$$dt($p(VISIT(12),$c(1)))) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$C(27)_"&a1800h1480V"_$$dt($p(VISIT(61),$c(1)),$p(VISIT(62),$c(1)))) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a2880h1480V"_specimen) ; now centre code name d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a4500h1480V"_DTA) s cln=$p(VISIT(53),"|") i $l(cln)>85 f j=1:1 i $l($p(cln," ",1,j))>85 s cln=$p(cln," ",1,j) q i $l(cln) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a180h1830V"_cln) d TABS d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(3@") ; Select default font d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(5N") ; Primari symbol set ISO Latin 5 Mc_Fly June 19, 2003 d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s0p12h0s0b4099T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a0h2000V") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT","!") q ; print tabs down side of report (footer) TABS s (phone,DepName,xx1,xx2)="" s rowid="" f s rowid=$o(^TMP("REPORT",$j,page,"TEST",rowid)) q:rowid="" d .s dep=$e($p(rowid,"||",2)) i '$l(DepName),'$$select^LVBCTDEP(dep,"Y") s DepName=PLIST(3) .i " P T "[(" "_dep_" "),'$l(xx1),'$$select^LVBVISTS(rowid,"Y") s xx1=PLIST(7),xx2=PLIST(8) i $l(xx1) d .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p8v0s0b5T") .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a180h7675VAuth Time/Date:") .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s0b4101T") .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a780h7675V"_$$dt(xx1,xx2)) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s0b4101T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a780h7775V"_$$dt(+$h,$p($h,",",2))) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a4500h7775V"_phone) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a5150h7775V"_"Pg: "_page) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s0b5T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"*v0n1o1T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a1670h7600V") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"*c2140h300v0P") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a5500h2030V") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"*c210h1320v0P") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a5500h3980V") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"*c210h1290v0P") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a5500h5975V") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"*c210h1730v0P") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p9v0s0b5T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a1750h7690v0P Cap i BioquÃ­mica: "_$p($g(^TTAB("DEP","B")),"\",2)) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a1750h7780v0P Microbiologia: "_$p($g(^TTAB("DEP","M")),"\",2)) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a1750h7870v0P Hematologia: "_$p($g(^TTAB("DEP","H")),"\",2)) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s1p10v0s0b5T") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a0p5510h2130v270P"_DepName) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a0p5510h4000v270P"_$p(VISIT(66),$c(1),2)) d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a0p5510h6100v270P") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a0p0h0V") d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"*v0n0o0T") q dt(date,time) n (date,time) s date=$g(date),result="" i $g(time) s result=$e(time\3600+100,2,3)_":"_$e(time\60#60+100,2,3)_" "_$$extdate2^SSUTIL4(date) i '$d(time)!('$g(time)) s result=$$extdate2^SSUTIL4(date) q result ; print footer Footer(page,par1,par2) n (page,REPID,VISIT) s epis=$p(VISIT(2),$c(1)) ; print last page i $o(^TMP("REPORT",$j,page))="" d .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a500h7300V") .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$$allautho(epis)) .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"(s7B") i $o(^TMP("REPORT",$j,page))'="" d .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT",$c(27)_"&a4000h7500V") .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"PRT","Continua..") q allautho(epis) ; String of non authorised TestSets Mc_Fly June 17, 2003 n (epis) s (pend,sep,ts,cn)="" f s ts=$o(^TEPI(epis,1,ts)) q:ts="" d . f s cn=$o(^TEPI(epis,1,ts,cn)) q:cn="" d .. i $p(^(cn),"\",31)="A" q .. s pend=pend_sep_$p(^TTAB("TS",ts),"\",2),sep="," i pend="" q "*** Final ***" q "Pendent: "_pend QDR s QDR="HMB",x="" f s x=$o(^SS("QDR",QDR,x)) q:x="" d .i $p(^SS("QDR",QDR,x),"-",1)="BITMAP" d q ..s bitmap=$tr($p(^SS("QDR",QDR,x),"-",2,99)," ") ..s bit="" f s bit=$o(^SS("QDR",bitmap,bit)) q:bit="" d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"HDR",^SS("QDR",bitmap,bit)) .d ADD^PRTREP00(REPID,"HDR",^SS("QDR",QDR,x)) q ; called from SSPRINT via @ command hmb(bitmap) s bit="" f s bit=$o(^SS("QDR",bitmap,bit)) q:bit="" w ^SS("QDR",bitmap,bit) q name(Title,Name,Surname) n (Title,Name,Surname) s result="" s Title=$g(Title),Name=$g(Name),Surname=$g(Surname) s result=Surname_", "_$s($l(Title):Title_" ",1:"")_" "_Name q result q
